doc:
Sunshine Parker https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sunshine_Parker 0 Sunshine Parker (June 10, 1927 – February 17, 1999) was an American actor. He was born as Lloyd Olen Parker in Lawn, Texas. He is best known for his roles as Emmet in Road House and Edgar Deems in Tremors. He typically played minor roles as either a "bum" or an "old codger/geezer" stock character. Sunshine_Parker ( June_10_,_1927 – February_17_,_1999 ) was an_American_actor . He was_born as Lloyd_Olen_Parker in Lawn , Texas . He is_best_known for his_roles as Emmet in Road_House and Edgar Deems in Tremors . He typically played minor_roles as either a_"_bum " or an_"_old_codger/geezer_"_stock_character .
